1.The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
2.Education is the manifestation of perfection already existing in man.
3.You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
4.Arise,awake,stop not until your goal is achieved.
5.Strength is Life, Weakness is Death. Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death. Love is Life, Hatred is Death.
6.They alone live, who live for others.
7.religion is no matter of books and beliefs, but of spiritual realisation.
8.God did not give me everything that i wanted. But, He gave me everything that i needed!
